duration.description: Duration of the call in seconds

updated_at.description: Time the call was last updated

direction.description: Whether the call is inbound or outbound

staff_uid.description: Unique identifier for the staff member who answered the call

client_uid.description: Unique identifier for the client who made the call

from_number_id.description: Unique identifier for the number the call was made from

to_number_id.description: Unique identifier for the number the call was made to

recording.description: URL to the recording of the call

external_app_link.description: URL to an external app page with more details about the call

deleted_at.description: Time the call was deleted - is null if the call is not deleted
